name: twister
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make each target flinch. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pok√©mon. This may also make them flinch.
